content.html: One thing I do not like on all social media platforms is that people take others' work for granted. Why is so hard to give credit? A retweet instead of stealing the joke, a share, and a tag? Laziness is not an excuse. Photo @austinkleon's book: Share your work
content.value:
One thing I do not like on all social media platforms is that people take others' work for granted. Why is so hard to give credit? A retweet instead of stealing the joke, a share, and a tag? Laziness is not an excuse. 
Photo @austinkleon's book: Share your work
